item.description: Welcome October with a semi-annual happy hour for event-goers who subscribe to Hubbub!, an email newsletter about after-work events in Boston. A modest fee covers appetizers and a separate space. Many readers are European or Euro-fans. Be sure to register at http://hhh121001.eventbrite.com. (No walk-ins please).UPTO 4:00 PM TODAY.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my pic; please come over and say hello.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Aafter-work social in Back Bay
